TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVbcHostObject implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost

Docs.summary: Defines an interface that allows the [Vbc](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3) task to communicate with the host integrated development environment (IDE).

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface allows the `Vbc` task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.
